data.title: Tier Is the New Frontier of IT Operations Management
data.text:
Sun is focusing its N1 products in three key areas: infrastructure provisioning, service provisioning, and service-level automation.

The N1 Service Provisioning System (formerly N1 CenterRun) allows customers to automate the configuration and deployment of applications from a central console to make configuring and deploying applications faster, simpler, and more reliable.

N1 Provisioning Server provides the ability to manage physical devices as a pool of virtualized resources.
